extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed FortiOS or FortiProxy version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update FortiOS or FortiProxy to the fixed version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Systems for Evidence of Exploit
extracted_playbook.description: Review the systems for evidence of exploit of previous vulnerabilities, notably CVE-2022-04-0684.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Hardening Recommendations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement vendor-recommended hardening measures to enhance system security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Attack Surface
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused features and manage devices via an out-of-band method wherever possible to minimize the attack surface.
